Headline: #49 Western Temporary Northbound Reroute near Western/Harrison
ShortDescription: NB 49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Roosevelt, Damen, Van Buren, and Western due to, street blockage near Western/Harrison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Roosevelt, Damen, Van Buren, and Western due to, street blockage near Western/Harrison.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
